title: Leaving Certificate Project Maths - Higher Level
headline: This free online maths course is for anyone interested in studying the Project Maths Higher Level Course.
description: Looking for a comprehensive syllabus and assessment that tests learners on the entire content of the Irish Leaving Certificate Maths Higher Level syllabus? Well look no further, this course covers topics including probability and statistics, geometry and trigonometry, numbers and shapes, algebra, functions and calculus. This course provides students with videos on all these Higher Level topics in one location, listed by module and topic.
courseDescription:
Project Maths is part of the Irish curriculum, but this course can be taken by anyone who wants to improve their understanding of high school mathematics. It provides students with videos on all the Higher Level maths topics as well as a comprehensive assessment that tests learners on the entire content of the Project Maths Higher Level syllabus. Modules cover probability and statistics, geometry and trigonometry, numbers and shapes, algebra, functions and calculus.

This course will help you to solve mathematical probability problems and statistical equations. You will learn how to use trigonometry to find the area, sides and angles of shapes, and work with different number systems and series. Next, you will be taught to calculate percentages, profit and interest, including VAT (value-added tax) and APR (annual percentage rate). Move onto solving for the length, area and volume of 2D and 3D shapes before learning to solve quadratic equations and equations with indices, including simultaneous equations. Finally, get to grips with functions and fractions.

Because this course is self-paced and charges no sign-up or subscription fees, you can move through the material as quickly or slowly as you like, taking your time with any parts of maths you struggle with. By the end, you will have a thorough grounding in the key parts of the Project Maths syllabus.
